segments.text: Excuse me , sir ? I just need a little bit more information . Could you tell me your telephone number and mailing address ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . My number is 545-8897 , and I live at 908 Mulbury Street .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s 545-8897 and your mailing address is 908 Mulbury Street . The zip code is 20310 , right ?
segments.speaker: S1
